verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: touted] [ARG1: his administration 's effort to increase military investment] [ARGM-TMP: during a commencement address at the U.S. Naval Academy on Friday] .
President Trump touted his administration 's effort to [V: increase] [ARG1: military investment] during a commencement address at the U.S. Naval Academy on Friday .
